name: Euclidsweeper
description:
Place flags and avoid mines on an infinitely wrapping Euclidean grid.

Started as a programming challenge, but it just kept growing until it got to what you see here.

Controls:

Click an unrevealed cell to reveal.

Right click an unrevealed cell to place a flag.

Click a numbered cell to reveal all non flagged cells surrounding it.

Right click and drag to pan the grid.

The mute button is a hold over from the android version, this one has no sound anyways.
